ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Couple of  questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Try going to Highhold and getting in a Goblin group in the Warrior or Raider room, with a good group its sweet XP, i level from 30 to 34 there in 3 days (about
ygData.messageBody:
Try going to Highhold and getting in a Goblin group in
the Warrior or Raider room, with a good group its
sweet XP, i level from 30 to 34 there in 3 days (about
24 hours total play time) and the loot is pretty good,
Bronze armor pieces and plat mostly.

or you can do what everyone else and there dog will
tell you to do and go to OT. which is supposed to be
good until 40.

--- "Jerry M. Banks" <y2kansas@...> wrote:
> I just hit level 30 last night, and being the Druid
> that I am, I had a
> couple of questions.
>
> First, I've been hunting in South Karana since level
> 25, hunting the Tesch
> Mas Gnolls around Paw, and perhaps have become a
> little spoiled, as I have
> been getting great experience killing the yellows
> and whites, and reaping
> the rewards of the loot. Now, having reached level
> 30, all of the gnolls are
> now nearing the point where hunting them isn't
> beneficial. Could someone
> suggest a similar zone/area with good experience and
> average to good loot
> where I could hunt fairly safely, either in a group
> or solo?
>
> Second, Could someone suggest an item for my arm,
> back, of legs that gives a
> decent (around +3) Wisdom modifer that I could try
> to track down for myself
> either through a quest or through hunting loot?
>
> Damasciss
> 30 Druid
> E'ci
>
>
>


=====
Xsdcsd
